com.mb3364.twitch.api.resources

Class UsersResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mb3364.twitch.api.resources.AbstractResource
      • com.mb3364.twitch.api.resources.UsersResource

  • public class UsersResource
extends AbstractResource
    The UsersResource provides the functionality to access the /users endpoints of the Twitch API.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.mb3364.twitch.api.resources.AbstractResource

      • getSubscription

        public void getSubscription(java.lang.String user,
                            java.lang.String channel,
                            UserSubscriptionResponseHandler handler)
        Returns the channel subscription that the user subscribes to. Authenticated, required scope: Scopes.USER_SUBSCRIPTIONS
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user's name
        channel - the channel name of the subscription
        handler - the response handler

      • getFollows

        public void getFollows(java.lang.String user,
                       com.mb3364.http.RequestParams params,
                       UserFollowsResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a UserFollows object that contains a list of UserFollow objects representing channels the user is following.
        Parameters:
        user - the user's name
        params - the optional request parameters:
        • limit: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100.
        • offset: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0.
        • direction: Sorting direction. Default is desc. Valid values are asc and desc.
        • sortby: Sort key. Default is created_at. Valid values are created_at and last_broadcast.
        handler - the response handler

      • getFollows

        public void getFollows(java.lang.String user,
                       UserFollowsResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a UserFollows object that contains a list of UserFollow objects representing channels the user is following.
        Parameters:
        user - the user's name
        handler - the response handler

        Parameters:

        handler - the response handler

      • follow

        public void follow(java.lang.String user,
                   java.lang.String channel,
                   boolean enableNotifications,
                   UserFollowResponseHandler handler)
        Follow a channel. Must be authenticated as the user. Authenticated, required scope: Scopes.USER_FOLLOWS_EDIT
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user
        channel - the channel to follow
        enableNotifications - receive email/push notifications when channel goes live. Default is false.
        handler - the response handler

      • follow

        public void follow(java.lang.String user,

        Parameters:

        channel - the channel to follow
        handler - the response handler

      • getBlocks

        public void getBlocks(java.lang.String user,
                      com.mb3364.http.RequestParams params,
                      BlocksResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a list of Block objects on User's block list. List sorted by recency, newest first. Authenticated, required scope: Scopes.USER_BLOCKS_READ
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user
        params - the optional request parameters:
        • limit: Maximum number of objects in array. Default is 25. Maximum is 100.
        • offset: Object offset for pagination. Default is 0.
        handler - the response handler

      • getBlocks

        public void getBlocks(java.lang.String user,
                      BlocksResponseHandler handler)
        Returns a list of Block objects on User's block list. List sorted by recency, newest first. Authenticated, required scope: Scopes.USER_BLOCKS_READ
        Parameters:
        user - the authenticated user
        handler - the response handler

                     BlockResponseHandler handler)
        Blocks a target for the authenticated user. Authenticated, required scope: Scopes.USER_FOLLOWS_EDIT
        Parameters:

        handler - the response handler
